mapper.select: SELECT case when B.COLUMN_NAME in (SELECT cols.column_name FROM all_constraints cons JOIN all_cons_columns cols ON cons.constraint_name = cols.constraint_name WHERE cons.owner = #{username} AND cons.table_name = #{tableName} AND cons.constraint_type = 'P') then 'Y' else 'N' end as IS_PRIMARY_KEY, B.COLUMN_NAME, A.COMMENTS, B.DATA_TYPE, B.DATA_LENGTH, B.NULLABLE, (SELECT comments FROM DBA_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE table_name = #{tableName}) as TABLE_COMMENTS FROM ALL_COL_COMMENTS A, ALL_TAB_COLUMNS B WHERE A.OWNER = B.OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME AND A.OWNER = #{username} AND A.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} ORDER BY B.COLUMN_ID
SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM USER_TABLES ORDER BY TABLE_NAME
